          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre trois rayons de lumière  frappant une limite entre l'air et le verre.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows three rays of light hitting an air-glass boundary.</string>

            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra tre raggi di luce che
